name: searchoffers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool google_jobs.
Tool description: Google Jobs Scraper
API description: Gets all job offers from the given parameters.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for job offers.

posted.description: The time frame for when the job offers were posted (e.g., 'last 24 hours', 'last 7 days').

offset.description: The index offset for pagination of results.

location.description: The location to search for job offers.
